comment.author: 57089806@N00
comment._content: Murren's a Swiss resort, she was a prominent British aristocrat who later lost her son at age 9. No ideas on Mr. Norum

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%c3%bcrren British winter tourists started coming to Müren in 1911. So she and the Asquiths [ www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3084418809/ ] were pioneers.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: It's the wife of George Rous, 3rd Earl of Stradbroke, the former Helena Violet Alice Fraser (died 14 April 1949), daughter of Lt.-Gen. James Keith Fraser. She married Stradbroke on 23 July 1898. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Rous,_3rd_Earl_of_Stradbroke See photo in lafayette.org.uk/tul1431.html
